title: aparam na jAnAmitE
sahitya:
aparam na janAmitE (shrI krSNa) hE paramAnanda
		(madhyamakAla)
mukhita apajAdhipa pada kara giridhara mAdhavE krSNa mA bhavay-


anupallavi

  vipuladhara nayanayuta shObha mukha sundara 
vipartE muni hrdaya sarasIhrta mandaras shrI krSNa


caraNam    sama sarasama pada sarasa nava pada yuvati sarasamahrdi
sarasam dE murArE muraLIdhara hariy-
